A policy that promotes clear communications and minimizes disruption to market expectations would be ethically sound, balancing accuracy with user-friendliness.

q9: 2011 AG5 (also known as C/2011 A9, initially reported by astronomers in Australia) was not officially observed at interstellar distances. The first recognized  discovered and characterized interstellar object is 'Oumuamua, passing through our solar system around March 2017.
